content.text: 0) Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
1) Drop in potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Drop in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "potatoes"@11:19 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-1-1 "cook"@24:28 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until tender but still firm"@29:56 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-1-0 "15 minutes"@64:74 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Season with salt, then mash potatoes with fork.
4) Place in large bowl, and stir in egg and olive oil.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Place"@3:8 / AC
		:gol ( tool-4-0 "large bowl"@12:22 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "stir in"@28:35 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-2 "egg"@36:39 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "olive oil"@44:53 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 5) Knead in enough flour to make a soft dough.
6) On a floured surface, roll dough into a long rope.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "roll"@25:29 / AC
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a floured surface"@6:23 / TOOL )
		:ppt ( "dough"@30:35 / FOOD )
		:reshape ( "a long rope"@41:52 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.
9) Drop in gnocchi, and cook until they float to the top, about 3 to 5 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Drop in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( "gnocchi"@11:18 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-9-1 "cook"@24:28 / AC
		:until ( cond-9-0 "until they float to the top"@29:56 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "3 to 5 minutes"@64:78 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
